name: afrilectrical-react-performance
description: Performance optimization recommendations for AFRILECTRICAL React app

compressionRecommendations.gzip: Enable gzip compression on your server
compressionRecommendations.brotli: Enable Brotli compression for better compression ratios
compressionRecommendations.headers: Set proper cache headers for static assets

imageOptimization.webp: Use WebP format for modern browsers
imageOptimization.avif: Consider AVIF format for even better compression
imageOptimization.lazy: Use intersection observer for lazy loading

codeOptimizations.treeShaking: Ensure tree shaking is enabled in production builds
codeOptimizations.splitting: Implement proper code splitting for vendor libraries
